page.title: 13PLAYGROUND GAMES 1
page.content: { Bulldog}is a running game.The person who is on stands in the middle of the playground and calls a name.That person has to run from one side of the playground to the other and the person who is on has to try and tig him.If he does tig him, he has to be on as well.If he gets to the other side then that is{Bulldog}and everyone runs. Sometimes the person who is on calls{ {Bulldog}and everyone has to run. The game ends when the person who is on has caught everybody. { Chinese Whispers}is played by a group of children sitting in a circle.The person who is on thinks of word or sentence and whispers it to the next person, then she whispers it to the next person and so on.The last person shouts out what she thinks the first person said.You get some really funny endings.
